abstract: BP released the results of an internal investigation that heaped some of the blame on itself, but mostly pointed at other companies.
snippet: BP released the results of an internal investigation that heaped some of the blame on itself, but mostly pointed at other companies.
lead_paragraph: BP spent months this summer trying to contain the gusher of oil on the floor of the Gulf of Mexico. Now the company is trying to contain the legal and financial fallout from the explosion of the Deepwater Horizon, and on Wednesday it released the results of an internal investigation that mostly pointed fingers at other companies, Ian Urbina writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: BP Spill Report Hints at Legal Defense
